page.title: 12CLUBS PAGE 1
page.content:
I go to the Karate club and I take lessons.After a year you take a belt. After that you can take other belts.You keep on going until you reach a Black Belt.The club is on Monday and Tuesday's at evenings at Rainhall Road School.
I belong to a Cricket Club called Javed C.C standing for Javed Cricket Club.There are 13 or 14 members. Javed is our manager and Liqoat is our coach.Our team is OK but not a really big one.However we have everything in it we need. Mostly we meet at West Craven High School to play matches.
